title: Estimate Impact of Alternative Minimum Tax (AMT)
description: A high-income taxpayer with significant itemized deductions wants to know if they will be subject to the AMT.

tasks.description: Calculate the taxpayer's regular tax liability.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the tax under the standard rules.

tasks.description: Prepare Form 6251 to calculate the tentative minimum tax by adding back certain deductions (like state and local taxes).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately calculates the tax under the AMT system.

tasks.description: Compare the regular tax to the tentative minimum tax and advise the client if they owe the higher AMT amount.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines the taxpayer is subject to AMT and explains the reason.
